caption.p: Significant origin effects for (a) total biomass, (b) root–shoot ratio (RSR), (c) leaf number, (d) leaf life span, (e) LDMC (leaf dry matter content), (f) CN ratio, (g) root area, and (h) total root length of native German (GE; gray boxes) and exotic New Zealand (NZ; white boxes) plants. For statistical details, see Table 2
